ygData.subject: Re: Make research fun
ygData.msgSnippet: How about some URL s my friend :) I know of Graffe or whatever the sitename is-but are there others ? ...
ygData.messageBody:
How about some URL's my friend :)
I know of Graffe or whatever the sitename is-but
are there others ?


--- Keith Wiseman <keithw@...> wrote:
> From: Keith Wiseman <keithw@...>
>
> The Library at Erudin is really a spell library not
> a book library.
> Research 'books' and your Lexicon can be found at
> your guild or on some
> mobs.
>
> There are websites for more information on this
> stuff if you want to do some
> research on Research. :)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Tong [mailto:biltong88@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 7:38 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Make research fun
>
> From: Bill Tong <biltong88@...>
>
> Yeah ,
> What is up with the library at Erudin ?
> I have been in there several times - but no books.
> How am I supposed to do the reaserch ?
>
> Do I like need the card and metioned below and must
> I
> give it to someone ? Like Toll Nicealot which
> has never been nice to me ?
>
>
> --- Joe Wallace <joew88@...> wrote:
> > From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
> >
> > Do you need something special to get into the
> > Library at Erudin? I've never
> > been there, but I ask because I was near Qeynos
> one
> > time and a guard walked
> > by me, and he said "My! Did I just drop
> something?"
> > And he walked on. I
> > looked and found what looks like a library card,
> > marked Library of Erudin.
> > Is this a quest item? Or do you need a card to
> > visit the library?
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
> > To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 7:41 AM
> > Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Make research fun
> >
> >
> > > From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
> > >
> > > Erudin Erudin Erudin.... click your heels
> together
> > 3 times as well... and
> > > poof you wont be in Kansas any more...[look to
> the
> > library]
> > >
> > > Rutreeii
> > > Cazic-Thul
> > >
> >
> >
